data.system_settings: iOS 9.3.5, latest current build (1.8.3) on iPad 4th gen.
data.actual_result: The image opens in your chosen web browser.
data.expected_result: You get a popup modal within Discord of the image.
data.short_description: Tapping images in embeds loads them in a browser, not in-app
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an image that is "embedded" within an embed. - Tap it.
